title: Daffodil

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may search a player for a clue of their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If your target is Doused/Framed/Disguised/Hexed you will instead be told you are unsure what your target is.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to investigate (player).
"Your target could be (investigative list)."
"You could not tell what your target could be." (if target is Doused/Framed/Disguised/Hexed)

desc:
Post 149
*You are a collected inquisitor who often get second thoughts about your information.*
